sentences.en: ...the absolute depravity that can exist in war.
sentences.cn: ...能够存在于战争中的绝对堕落。

sentences.en: Arminius is misrepresented concerning total depravity.
sentences.cn: 阿明尼乌有关全然败坏的观点被曲解.

sentences.en: Conduct or an action marked by depravity or brutality.
sentences.cn: 表现为野蛮或残忍的行为或举止.

sentences.en: Experiencing life does not mean depravity and indulgence.
sentences.cn: 体验生活并不意味着堕落和放纵。

sentences.en: I do not like to smoke, because I do not want to own that depravity decadent.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢抽烟, 因为我不想拥有那堕落的颓废.

sentences.en: It is a mark of depravity to make a mock of good advice and kind rebuke.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑别人的忠告和善意指责是堕落的标志.

sentences.en: It'seemed to reveal to her an undreamed depravity in her nature.
sentences.cn: 这念头似乎对她揭露了自己本性里过去竟想不到的一种劣根性.

sentences.en: Last night's harrowing television pictures plumbed new depths of depravity.
sentences.cn: 昨晚触目惊心的电视画面堕落到了新低。

sentences.en: Long or frequent depravity is a kind of morbidity!
sentences.cn: 长期或经常的堕落就是一种病态!

sentences.en: The Master - at - Arm's character shows " a depravity according to nature ".
sentences.cn: 这位军械长的性格表现出 “ 一种服从本能的堕落. ”

sentences.en: The revolters have gone deep in depravity, But I will chastise all of them.
sentences.cn: 何5:2这些悖逆的人 、 肆行杀戮、罪孽极深.我却斥责他们众人.

sentences.en: To criminate God and to excuse ourselves is always an evidence of ignorance and depravity.
sentences.cn: 归罪于上帝和宽恕自己总是愚蠢角落的证据.

sentences.en: Were my teachers, perhaps, so good that they could not understand the depths of my depravity?
sentences.cn: 难道我的老师们是那么的善良, 以致于无法理解我的堕落深度?

words.tran_cn: 使腐化（deprave的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 堕落，腐败，恶行，堕落腐化的行为
trans.tran_en: Depravity is very dishonest or immoral behaviour
